aboutme.label: About Me
aboutme.question: Hello World, how can I help you change the world?
aboutme.firstp: I had a great learning experience within the junior IT company at UFBA, the great InfoJr, I fell in love with web programming and went after the news and joy that this world brings every day, I participated in real team projects as a front-end developer and I developed soft-skills in the human resources sector.
aboutme.secondp: I'm currently specializing more in front-end and starting to learn back-end, I like challenges and love to create solutions. I want to bring solutions in an impactful way, so, shall we code?

allProjects.name: Feedback Widget
allProjects.description: Learning with the NLW Return (Rocketseat)! Project mobile, front-end and back-end. A feedback widget that print your screen and send the photo and your comment to an email.

allProjects.name: Semcomp 2021
allProjects.description: Web development of a website for the Computing Week event that is made by InfoJr. (Project made at InfoJr)

allProjects.name: Portfolio
allProjects.description: Web development of a website to be a portfolio of a web developer.

allProjects.name: Parapais
allProjects.description: Organization, team monitoring and web development of an institutional website and system for the Parapais research group, from the UFBA Institute of Psychology. (Project made at InfoJr)

allProjects.name: Construrec
allProjects.description: Web development of a professional website for the junior civil engineering company ConstruREC. (Project made at InfoJr)

allProjects.name: Discord Bot (MiniKrakenBOT)
allProjects.description: A Discord bot with some simple functions made with Discord.js

contact.label: Contact
contact.p: I am currently looking for internship or junior level opportunities! If you know of any vacancies, have any questions or just want to talk to me about anything, just send me an email or fill out the form.
contact.dialogFail: There was a problem and the message was not sent :(
